commands_raw:
You only scored a 69 out of 100.
--- 
You are upset.
---
What do you do?
?>Meditate under a nearby tree ->info
?> Come up with a new study plan 
to perform better next time ->info
name: Start

commands_raw:
“The choice to meditate is an “emotion-focused” coping technique. In emotion-focused coping techniques, the aim is to reduce negative emotions. Meditation can give you a sense of calm, peace and balance that can benefit your emotional well-being and your overall health.”
---
“The choice to come up with a new study plan is a ‘problem-focused’ coping technique. Such techniques aim to tackle problems head-on and eliminate the root cause of stress.”
---
Neither choice is incorrect. One should try and adopt both emotion-focused and problem-focused coping techniques to deal with stress and to remove the stressors altogether.”
name: info
